title: M_TASK_GROUP
description: Materialised form of `TASK_GROUP` from a Task Plan definition.
$comments: Defined in Materialised IM, inherits from M_PLAN_ITEM

definition.description: Reference to corresponding TASK_GROUP instance in Task Plan definition.

members.description: Member run-time items in group, mimicking structure of the corresponding definition group instance.

lifecycle_state.description: Effective lifecycle state, computed from the states of members of the group.
